data.description:
LIMINAL PHASE is a journey into the dark corners of Frank's fractured mind as he's struggling with psychic pain and teetering on the brink of a mental breakdown. Obsessed with videogames, Frank's world is turned upside down when a floppy disk containing the game Sanctum 3-D mysteriously appears in his apartment. 

As Frank becomes more immersed in the game, it becomes harder for him to distinguish between fantasy and reality. In order to save himself from spiraling further into darkness and from reaching the bottom of the dark spiral he's caught in, Frank must  confront his deepest fears and battle his way through twisted and horrific environments created by his own mind.

This VR action horror game, set in a parallel ‘90s, invites players to fight malevolent monsters, solve peculiar puzzles, and explore Frank's troubled psyche.

Inspired by games and movies from the era of CRT TVs, MS-DOS, and big box PC games, LIMINAL PHASE is a haunting and immersive experience for fans of horror.

FEATURES
- An engaging and short single-player action horror story in VR
- Malevolent monsters and bizarre weapons
- Varied gameplay set in a parallel '90s
- An original soundtrack and lo-fi aesthetics 
- Secrets and Easter eggs
- Free movement, teleport, smooth and snap turn
- Achievements and leaderboard

changelog.change_log:
Update notes for 1.0.7

We've just released version 1.0.7!

With this update, we have made some major changes to core player mechanics.



1. Support for room scale

We've added room-scale and the annoying "Out of bounds" message is now gone. The game is still played best stationery.



2. Player speed tweaks

The player speed is now adjusted (faster), and should also be consistent on all headsets.



3. Updated physics

The physics detection calculations are improved, which means that you can now pick up a glass with the fork and spin it around �



Besides this, we've also:

- Done some minor graphical tweaks.

- Fixed a bug where you could accidentally push through geometry.



If you find any bugs, please let us know on Discord.



Thank you for the feedback and support!

Join our mailing list so you don’t miss out on any important news!

- Fixed collider issues with bedroom furniture.

- Fixed a problem with getting up from the armchair in the last part of the game.

 - Made the red door crank easier to spot.

 - Some other minor bug fixes.

"- New splash screen to clarify that this is a standing / sitting experience.

- Audio tweaks and new SFX added.

- New audio ambience zones added in Episode 3.

- Major update related to the small locked red doors. These are now unlocked in a certain pattern.

- Added more scare events.

- Fixed checkpoint issue in Episode 2.

- Several minor bugs fixed.
"
